programme.desc: Travelling through the murky waters of the Florida Everglades, Bear tests his survival skills by taking the biggest risk yet - swimming across an alligator-infested river.

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Just as the fleet seems set to home in on the gold, equipment problems cause setbacks, costing each crew precious time under the water.

programme.title: Wild Family Rescue
programme.desc: The Raneys are called to a failing Homestead in Colorado. Plus, Don makes a 40 mile commute each day leaving Lorinda alone and terrified of the bears and mountain lions.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: Two Chevy pickup trucks need a lot of work to get back on the road. The squad have their work cut out finishing the job on this father-son project.

programme.title: Ultimate Car Build-Off
programme.desc: Speed Unlimited and Hollywood Hot Rods compete to transform their hearses into hill climbers. Who will win this extreme incline challenge?

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The 405 is in California taking on Boddie and his group of racers, but it hasnt been an easy night so far. This time around, theres more than just money on the line.

programme.title: Garage Rehab
programme.desc: Richard Rawlings and Chris Stephens invest in failing garage, Grapevine Automotive, just outside Dallas - but they have less than a week to overhaul the shop.

programme.title: Bitchin Rides
programme.desc: The 67 GTO is ready for its debut, but the team isnt sure about Daves colour choice. Polished panels, custom upholstery and a fierce engine make it stand out.

programme.title: Goblin Works Garage
programme.desc: When a Ford Capri rolls into the garage, the Goblin team add a 5 litre, 2017 Mustang engine. Meanwhile, Ant and Helen are getting a tattoo.

programme.title: Worlds Biggest Shipbuilders
programme.desc: The construction of the vessels bow and stern begins in Poland, but its a bumpy start for the new build. Meanwhile in Korea, the XLE4s hull is being completed.

programme.title: Ultimate Ninja Challenge
programme.desc: Racing against the clock, the survivalists must carry a 125-pound captive through brutal terrain including sheer drops, mountain gorges, and frigid waterfalls.

programme.title: Gold Divers

programme.title: Treasure Quest: Snake Island

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: More everyday items are put under the microscope, including ice cream cones, tent trailers, shoe polish and pliers.

programme.title: How Its Made

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: With only a few list races left, everyone in the 405 rushes to fix up their cars in time. On race night, Reaper fights to hold onto the 10 spot.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Its the final race of the season and everyone is preparing for their last chance to move up the list. The tension has never been higher between the racers in the 405.

programme.title: Ultimate Survival
programme.desc: Bear faces the icy peaks of the Chugach Mountains, one of the toughest environments known. Each year, over one million people visit and 500 become stranded.

programme.title: Ultimate Survival
programme.desc: Join Bear Grylls as he travels to Hawaii to demonstrate how to survive one of the toughest and most dangerous places on Earth: Mount Kilauea, the worlds most active volcano.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: NASCAR champion Ryan Newman gets ATM to make a desk aquarium, and Red Sox star Shane Victorino asks the guys to build a Hawaiian-themed tank.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Baseball legend Pete Rose wants Riverfront Stadium transformed into an aquarium. Later, Wayde and Heather travel to Horry County to build a huge aquarium.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Lake Windsor on Inagua Island is home to a mystery. How did giant ocean-dwelling fish get there? The team aims to find out - and catch some bonefish.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: The Arapaima is the worlds largest scaled freshwater fish and considered the ultimate jungle catch. The crew heads to Ecuador to land one of these living dinosaurs.

programme.title: Driving Wild
programme.desc: Elvis is in Sweden and has just a week and 500 to transform scrapyard Saab into a Folkrace car in one of the countrys biggest motorsport events.

programme.title: Driving Wild
programme.desc: Elvis teams up with amateur dragster Freddy, and attempts to use his F1 skills to make Freddys 56 Chevy capable of defeating Cubas drag-racing champion.

programme.title: Driving Wild
programme.desc: Elvis builds a long-tail boat, using his F1 skills to reduce friction and give the engine more grunt, to compete at one of Thailands biggest events.

programme.title: Garage Rehab
programme.desc: Richard Rawlings and Chris Stephens invest in failing garage, Grapevine Automotive, just outside Dallas - but they have less than a week to overhaul the shop.

programme.title: Garage Rehab
programme.desc: Richard Rawlings and Russell Holmes are off to see Westside Hotrod shop in Los Angeles. They have less than a week to tame the wildcard Hotrod Shop owner.

programme.title: Ultimate Car Build-Off
programme.desc: Its an epic competition day as two shops try to lift their front ends, and their spirits, and ride their way into the Detroit final.

programme.title: Goblin Works Garage
programme.desc: Jimmy deVille works on a motorsport legend, the Escort Mk2 rally car. When he finds a rust-free South African import, the team take this custom build sideways!

programme.title: Goblin Works Garage
programme.desc: The team see potential in a 1980s MG sports car with an ugly rubber bumper. Using the elegant stripped back speedster look, they create a radical new shape.

programme.title: Goblin Works Garage

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Set in the village of Pontypandy in Wales, follow the adventures of Fireman Sam as he comes to the rescue of his friends and colleagues in various perilous situations.

programme.title: Tiger Cage III
programme.desc: Two cops investigate the shady dealings of a rich businessman but are set up and assaulted. As they uncover the mastermind behind, the final showdown becomes inevitable.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: Guan Yu is held hostage by Cao, the enemy of his sworn brother Liu, and must fight for Cao. He has to fight a dangerous battle before he can rescue Lius concubine from Cao.

programme.title: The Hidden Enforcers
programme.desc: A retired police officer trains four assassins to punish wrongdoers who escaped from conviction. However, his good intention turns sour when the assassins kill the cops.

programme.title: Widow Warriors
programme.desc: When the men in a triad family are betrayed and gunned down by a rival gang, their wives decide to take revenge for the death of their husbands.

programme.title: Century of the Dragon
programme.desc: An undercover detective is assigned to take down a triad boss, but as their friendship develops over time, the detective is torn between duty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Fist of Legend
programme.desc: Chen Zhen fights against the Black Dragon Society, who uses his comrades to test a new drug used to boost the strength of the Japanese troops in war.

programme.title: Helios
programme.desc: When the notorious criminal, Helios steals a powerful weapon from South Korea and attempts to sell it in Hong Kong, the police forces of these two lands must join hands.

programme.title: Whampoa Blues
programme.desc: Cong and Jin are students of Whampoa Military Training School. They incidentally discover an ammunition smuggling plan and get themselves into danger...

programme.title: A World Without Thieves
programme.desc: While con man Bo and femme fatale Li swindle their way across China, Li suddenly decides to leave Bo. However, their encounter with Fu Gen changes their fate forever.

programme.title: Colour of the Loyalty
programme.desc: A triad boss elite guards need to protect him from assassination. As one guard witnesses the elimination of other triad bosses, he unravels a huge conspiracy.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: Five bounty hunters are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings plaguing a hotel group in Bangkok. Can they solve the crime and finally collect the bounty?

programme.title: The New Option
programme.desc: An elite cop fulfils his dream to join the Special Duty Unit, facing rigorous training and the challenge of stopping a daring heist by a gang of dangerous criminals.

programme.title: The Iron Fisted Monk
programme.desc: After learning kung fu from Shaolin, Husker teams up with the Iron Fisted Monk to fight against the Manchus who have killed villagers and raped women.

programme.title: Fire of Conscience
programme.desc: Detective Manfred teams up with Inspector Kee to investigate a homicide. As corruption surfaces, Manfred unravels a web of deceit that puts the Hong Kong Police Force at risk.

programme.title: Gun N Rose
programme.desc: A Taiwanese gang boss names his adopted son Long Yi as successor, provoking his biological son Long Er to murder him. Long Yi must now confront Long Er in a final battle.

programme.title: Seoul Raiders
programme.desc: A special agent from the Japanese National Security teams up with a skilled thief to find a pair of plates used to make counterfeit USD.

programme.title: House of Fury
programme.desc: When their father disappears, sparring siblings Nicky and Natalie embark on a mission to look for their lost family member.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey Of A Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Nui uses his boxing skills to help the weak fight villains. He accepts a death combat challenge so as to take revenge for his friend.

programme.title: Warriors Two
programme.desc: Fatty helps his friend Wah to learn martial arts from his Wing Chun master, so that Wah can take down the villains and avenge his mothers death.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: At the dawn of 1997, three notorious Hong Kong thieves coincidentally meet in a restaurant, sparking rumours of a huge heist before the Handover unbeknownst to them.

programme.title: Guns and Roses
programme.desc: Jin Shui risks all to save his family, fleeing France with the help of his friend. Amid challenges, Jin Shui faces a dilemma: love or loyalty to his friend.

programme.title: Kung Fu Angels
programme.desc: A spoiled girl is transferred to a new sports school where she meets a handsome kung fu team captain and decides to try wushu. Little does she know that would change her life...

programme.title: The Inspector Wears Skirts
programme.desc: In this slapstick comedy, an all-female police squad encounters sexism and conflicts during training, but must band together to take down a group of terrorists.

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran and an undercover cop lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok.

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: When long-lost twins, famous pianist John and criminal Boomer, reunite in Hong Kong and accidentally swap lives, Boomer vows to save John from the clutches of gangsters.

programme.title: Young Heroes Of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: Set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, a young man Chen Zhen, rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: Breaking News
programme.desc: A botched police stand-off with a gang of criminals is captured by TV cameras and broadcast live on TV, adding to the woes of the police attempting to nail these bad guys!

programme.title: Wild Search
programme.desc: In a gun trafficking raid, a police officer finds the little girl who witnessed her mothers murder by the ruthless gunrunners, and must protect her from being killed.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: Yu Xiang and her daughter move into a new neighbourhood where everyones life seems perfect. However, dark secrets and horror have raided each family from the inside.

programme.title: The Inspector Wear Skirt II
programme.desc: In this sequel, the female police squad members struggle to blend in with the new recruits, and must also join the Special Duty Unit to capture an escaped prisoner.

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: Monkey King emerges after Goddess Nuwas sacrifice to challenge the Jade Emperor, causing chaos that enables Buffalo Demon to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: Eclats De Vie
programme.desc: Lidylle entre une jeune artiste et lheritier dune famille fortunee, qui doit lutter pour imposer ses choix face son entourage, fait resurgir de lourds secrets.

programme.title: Passions Troubles
programme.desc: Un triangle amoureux vire au cauchemar la mort mysterieuse dun homme daffaires puissant, employeur de lhomme trompe. Ses proches sont tous suspectes.

programme.desc: Une jeune femme vierge tombe enceinte la suite dune erreur medicale. Soutenue par sa famille, elle apprend devenir mre sans jamais avoir connu lamour.

programme.desc: Veronica propose Julio de ne pas deposer plainte contre lui sil lui rend lenfant.
